description: Retrieves details about a specific session. For more information about sessions, see Store and retrieve conversation history and context with Amazon Bedrock sessions.

parameters.name: sessionIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the session to retrieve. You can specify either the session's sessionId or its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the session was created.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service key used to encrypt the session data. For more information, see Amazon Bedrock session encryption.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the session was last modified.

nested_items.name: sessionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the session in UUID format.

nested_items.name: sessionMetadata
nested_items.description: A map of key-value pairs containing attributes persisted across the session.

nested_items.name: sessionStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the session.
